metamodel.description:
Check this to generate data models on leading frameworks.
This Data Metamodel allows to model Application Object structure and persistence.
S-IDE provides the modeler to graphically produce data models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR500 Data

technology.description:
Check this to generate your Data models on the Alfresco product line.
Alfresco is the leading open source ECM solution.
S-IDE allows to optimize the configuration of the Alfresco content model, views, forms and reports.
technology.name: Alfresco

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate data models on the major release 3 of Alfresco.
Alfresco 3.x is the leading open source collaborative ECM solution.
Additionally to content generation, S-IDE provides useful server components to enhance some features of this release.

generatorVersion.description:
Check this to generate a full deployable Alfresco package containing the newly designed content types and other Alfresco artefacts.
The generated packages are standard Alfresco Module package which may be deployed in any Alfresco 3.x instance.
S-IDE provides the necessary components to deploy these packages through the 'deployer' tab.

configurationParameter.documentation:
Set this value to the version of the generated AMPs, default value is '1.0'.
At Alfresco start, the version is displayed in the console and may easily be checked to ensure good production deployment.
configurationParameter.label: Class Module version

option.documentation: Check this option to generate a default view for the document list of the Alfresco Share Document Library page.
option.label: Alfresco Share docList (default views)

option.documentation:
Check this option to include the production of the Alfresco Share's module extension in the generation.
If not checked, the extension modules are not included in the generated AMPs.
S-IDE provides extension modules to Alfresco Share in order to view and edit all the metadata of the newly generated content model.
option.label: Alfreco Share Extension

option.documentation:
Check this option to include the production of the Alfresco's report webscripts in the generation.
If not checked, the webscripts report are not included in the generated AMPs.
S-IDE allows to configure the Alfresco's report webscripts with the newly designed content types of the data model.
option.label: Alfresco Report Webscripts

option.documentation: Check this option to include all the meta-datas of the content type in Alfresco Share forms
option.label: Alfresco Share forms (default forms)

configurationParameter.documentation: Set this value to the URL of the Alfresco instance on which you want to generate and deploy this new content model from the SIDE data model.
configurationParameter.label: Alfresco URL

option.documentation:
Check this option to include the SIDE SQL extension module for Alfresco.
This module provides the synchronisation of alfresco data into a relational database.
Queries with joins can thus be performed.
option.label: Alfresco SQL
